original_title: The Legend of Amaluk: An Arctic Journey
overview: Nature film that takes place in the Yukon as it follows am Eskimo named Amaluk
tagline: More than 3 years in the making! North of the Yukon, raw courage in a raw domain ...where Life and Love are at stake! Trapped in the deadly grip of an Arctic earthquake, a lone man fights for his life.
title: The Legend of Amaluk: An Arctic Journey
